name: Pool it!
description:
Pool perfection has arrived. It's time to strap in, grab your cue, and dive into the pool experience of a lifetime.

Pool it! Is the pool game that does it all. Experience fluid gameplay, intuitive control, and hyper-realistic physics as you dive into the fun-fuelled world of non-stop ball games!

Boredom doesn't exist in Pool it. That's because there's always a new challenge waiting! Face off against your friends, tackle the leader boards, and discover a host of different objectives with incredible rewards.

GAME FEATURES

Seamless billiards action!
Face fresh challenges and pot spectacular balls with ease - pot a ball in every hole!

Stress-free shooting!
Say no to frustration and say hello to Pool it! Adjust your shots with pinpoint accuracy!

Picture perfect Pool!
Pool it! has been lovingly rendered to ensure it looks and feels fantastic! Watch as stunning flames burst from your ball as you land your wildest shots.

Make your own rules.
Who says you have to play by the rules? Play American pool, play snooker, play Russian billiards, or play how you want to. This is the pool game that makes you the boss. Get creative, forget the rules, and even create your very own unique ball games.

You don't need an invitation to join the fun! Just download Pool it! and pick up your cue now.
